name: Entrepreneur Training Program
description: The SF LGBT Center New Entrepreneur Training Program is a nine-week training program where twelve new entrepreneurs from different businesses (pre-existing or not) will work as a cohort in a mutually supportive environment to develop their respective businesses from the ground up. The program is currently open to individuals and businesses in San Francisco only. The program will cover all aspects of creating and running a new business, which includes marketing, business finance, entity formation
